sample.title: Dictionary Attack
sample.description: This template shows how a dictionary attack can be implemented and carried out in CrypTool 2 using a dictionary and a hash function.
sample.title: Wörterbuchangriff
sample.description: Diese Vorlage zeigt, wie in CrypTool 2 ein Wörterbuchangriff mit Hilfe eines Wörterbuchs und einer Hash-Funktion implementiert und durchgeführt werden kann.

replacement.value: This template shows how a dictionary attack can be built using CrypTool 2.\line\line The dictionary is indexed using a number. This number is incremented until the correct password is found.\line\line All entries of the dictionary are hashed and tested against the hash of the test password.\line\line Finally the found password and the correpsonding index are visible in the "Found password", "Found hash", and "Found index" textboxes.

This template shows how a dictionary attack can be built using CrypTool 2.\line\line The dictionary is indexed using a number. This number is incremented until the correct password is found.\line\line All entries of the dictionary are hashed and tested against the hash of the test password.\line\line Finally the found password and the correpsonding index are visible in the "Found password", "Found hash", and "Found index" textboxes.
